content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Leicester City 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, Leicester City 2.
Jesús Alfaro (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nampalys Mendy (Leicester City).
Foul by Sergi Roberto (Barcelona).
Bartosz Kapustka (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Leicester City 2. Rafael Mújica (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Àlex Carbonell.
Attempt missed. Àlex Carbonell (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
Foul by Àlex Carbonell (Barcelona).
Bartosz Kapustka (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Christian Fuchs.
Attempt missed. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ahmed Musa.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafael Mújica replaces Denis Suárez.
Substitution, Barcelona. Nili replaces Juan Cámara.
Substitution, Barcelona. Àlex Carbonell replaces Munir El Haddadi.
Substitution, Barcelona. José Aurelio Suárez replaces Jordi Masip.
Substitution, Barcelona. José Antonio Martínez replaces Jeremy Mathieu.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jesús Alfaro replaces Luis Suárez.
Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City).

Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ron-Robert Zieler.

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Jeremy Mathieu.
Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Munir El Haddadi.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Leicester City 2. Ahmed Musa (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Jeffrey Schlupp.
Substitution, Leicester City. Bartosz Kapustka replaces Marc Albrighton.
Substitution, Leicester City. Daniel Amartey replaces Danny Simpson.
Substitution, Barcelona. Carles Aleñá replaces Lionel Messi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Samper replaces Arda Turan.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Jeffrey Schlupp (Leicester City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater.
Offside, Leicester City. Nampalys Mendy tries a through ball, but Jeffrey Schlupp is caught offside.
Foul by Nampalys Mendy (Leicester City).
Arda Turan (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona).
Ahmed Musa (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Leicester City 1. Ahmed Musa (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Shinji Okazaki.
Substitution, Leicester City. Jeffrey Schlupp replaces Jamie Vardy.
Substitution, Leicester City. Luis Hernández replaces Robert Huth.
Substitution, Leicester City. Ahmed Musa replaces Demarai Gray.
Substitution, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano replaces Aleix Vidal.
Substitution, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs replaces Ben Chilwell.
Substitution, Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Substitution, Leicester City. Marcin Wasilewski replaces Wes Morgan.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergio Busquets replaces Marlon Santos.
Second Half begins Barcelona 3, Leicester City 0.
Substitution, Leicester City. Nampalys Mendy replaces Andy King.
First Half ends, Barcelona 3, Leicester City 0.

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Aleix Vidal.
